altername_name: Streets of Rage 2 - Street Fighter Heroes
name: Streets of Rage 2: The World Warrior: Special Air Combo Edition
overview: Hack Author: Dha Lau Hoo This hack is a special edition of Streets of Rage 2 - The World Warrior. It features the fighters from “Street Fighter II - the World Warrior” as playable characters. They are Dhalsim, Ryu, Guile and Ken. Air combo is enabled. Players can hit the enemies in the middle air to deliver more damage.
